Components/Base Components/audio-bubble.title: Audio Bubble
Components/Base Components/audio-bubble.description: CometChatAudioBubble is the content view for a MediaMessage if the media sent is an audio.

Components/Base Components/Avatar.title: Avatar
Components/Base Components/Avatar.description: The CometChatAvatar component displays user and group avatars. For users and groups , it displays either an image or the user's avatar and falls back to the first two letters of the username.

Components/Base Components/badge.title: Badge
Components/Base Components/badge.description: The CometChatBadgeCount component displays the unread count of messages for one-to-one private and group chats.

Components/Base Components/date.title: Date
Components/Base Components/date.description: CometChatDate is a widget which is used to show the date and time. You can also customize the appearance of this widget by modifying its logic.

Components/Base Components/file-bubble.title: File Bubble
Components/Base Components/file-bubble.description: CometChatFileBubble is the content view for a MediaMessage if the media sent is a file.

Components/Base Components/image-bubble.title: Image Bubble
Components/Base Components/image-bubble.description: CometChatImageBubble is the content view for a MediaMessage if the media sent is an image.

Components/Base Components/label-alignme.title: Label Alignment
Components/Base Components/label-alignme.description: LabelAlignment is used to align the label for web elements.

Components/Base Components/list-item.title: List Item
Components/Base Components/list-item.description: CometChatListItem contains one to three lines of text optionally flanked by icons or other widgets, such as CometChatAvatar, CometChatDate or Text. CometChatAvatar will always be shown in the leading view therefore either one among the avatarURL or  avatarName must be provided. The first line of text is optional and is specified with title.

Components/Base Components/media-recorde.title: Media Recorder
Components/Base Components/media-recorde.description: CometChatMediaRecorder is a class that allows users to record and send audio messages. It has a start button to start recording, a stop button to stop recording, a play button to play the recorded message, a pause button to pause the recorded message, a submit button to submit the recorded message and a close button to close the media recorder.

Components/Base Components/receipt.title: Receipt
Components/Base Components/receipt.description: The CometChatMessageReceipt component renders the  receipts such as sending, sent, delivered, read and error state indicator of a message.

Components/Base Components/status-indica.title: Status Indicator
Components/Base Components/status-indica.description: CometChatStatusIndicator is a customised component which indicates whether user is online or offline.

Components/Base Components/text-bubble.title: Text Bubble
Components/Base Components/text-bubble.description: CometChatTextBubble is the content view shown for TextMessage.

Components/Base Components/video-bubble.title: Video Bubble
Components/Base Components/video-bubble.description: CometChatVideoBubble is the content component for  Media message if the media sent is a video.

Components/Calls/Calls.title: Overview
Components/Calls/Calls.description: CometChat's Calls feature is a sophisticated function that facilitates the smooth integration of one-on-one and group audio-visual calling capabilities into your application, enhancing user interactivity and experience. This advanced feature is implemented effectively and efficiently in the React UI Kit.

Components/Components Overview.title: Overview
Components/Components Overview.description: CometChat's UI Kit is a set of pre-built UI components that allows you to easily craft an in-app chat with all the essential messaging features.

Components/Conversations/Contacts.title: Contacts
Components/Conversations/Contacts.description: CometChatContacts is a versatile UI component specifically designed to facilitate the display and management of users and groups within chat applications. It streamlines the process of showcasing all app users and available chat groups in a user-friendly interface, making it easier for users to connect and communicate effectively.

Components/Interactive Messages/Action E.title: Action Entity
Components/Interactive Messages/Action E.description: Base class for defining the type of actions that can be performed on BaseInteractiveElement

Components/Interactive Messages/Button E.title: Button Element
Components/Interactive Messages/Button E.description: The ButtonElement class, inherited from the BaseInteractiveElement class, represents an interactive button element that can be added to a chat interface. It comprises of properties like button text and a flag indicating whether the button should be disabled after interaction.

Components/Interactive Messages/Card Bub.title: Card Bubble
Components/Interactive Messages/Card Bub.description: The CometChatCardBubble component is used to display a card within a chat bubble. The card includes an image, text, and action buttons. It helps to offer action-oriented chat experiences, like booking a flight, ordering food, scheduling a meeting, etc., directly in the chat.

Components/Interactive Messages/Card Mes.title: Card Message
Components/Interactive Messages/Card Mes.description: The CardMessage class is used to create a card message for CometChat. It extends the InteractiveMessage class from CometChat.

Components/Interactive Messages/Checkbox.title: Checkbox Element
Components/Interactive Messages/Checkbox.description: The CheckboxElement class aids in creating checkbox input elements in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/Custom I.title: Custom Interactive Message
Components/Interactive Messages/Custom I.description: The CustomInteractiveMessage class extends CometChat's InteractiveMessage class and represents a custom interactive message that can be sent via CometChat.

Components/Interactive Messages/Dropdown.title: Dropdown Element
Components/Interactive Messages/Dropdown.description: The DropdownElement class is used to create a dropdown selection element in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/Element.title: Element Entity
Components/Interactive Messages/Element.description: This is the base class for every element possible in the Interactive message component, defined by cometchat

Components/Interactive Messages/Form Bub.title: Form Bubble
Components/Interactive Messages/Form Bub.description: The CometChatFormBubble component is used to render a form within a chat bubble. The form fields are dynamically built based on the data passed in the message prop. The form fields can include text inputs, checkboxes, radio buttons, dropdown, labels, single selects, buttons. Once the form is filled out and submitted, the data will be sent to the provided URL or handled by a custom function.

Components/Interactive Messages/Form Mes.title: Form Message
Components/Interactive Messages/Form Mes.description: The FormMessage class is used to create an interactive form message that can be sent via CometChat. It extends the InteractiveMessage class from CometChat.

Components/Interactive Messages/Label El.title: Label Element
Components/Interactive Messages/Label El.description: The LabelElement class enables the creation of a label element in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/Radio Bu.title: Radio Button Element
Components/Interactive Messages/Radio Bu.description: The RadioButtonElement class is designed to create a radio button input element in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/Single S.title: Single Select Element
Components/Interactive Messages/Single S.description: The SingleSelectElement class is utilised to create a single selection input element in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/Text Inp.title: Text Input Element
Components/Interactive Messages/Text Inp.description: The TextInputElement class is used to create a text input element in a user interface.

Components/Messages/Message Information.title: Message Information
Components/Messages/Message Information.description: The MessageInformation is a Component designed to display message-related information, such as delivery and read receipts. It serves as an integral part of the CometChat UI UI Kit, extending the List Item class, which provides the underlying infrastructure for CometChat UI components. With its rich set of methods and properties, developers can easily customize and tailor the appearance and behavior of the message information view to suit the specific requirements of their application.

Features/Call.title: Call
Features/Call.description: You can integrate voice and video calling SDK to add calling functionality to your CometChat-enabled application.

Guides/CometChat UI.title: Multi-Tab Chat UI Guide
Guides/CometChat UI.description: This guide will help you achieve a tabbed layout (aka Multi-Tab Chat UI) of the components available in CometChatUIKit for React-native.

Guides/expo-integration.title: Expo Integration
Guides/expo-integration.description: To run the CometChat UI Kit in Expo version 0.52 & above, you need to disable the new architecture of react native. You need to add/update the newArchEnabled flag in the app.json file present in the root directory of your project.

Overview/index.title: Overview
Overview/index.description: With CometChat's UI Kit for React Native, you can effortlessly build a chat app equipped with all the essential messaging features, along with customizable options tailored to your application requirements. This UI Kit comprises prebuilt UI components organized into smaller modules and components, each configurable to meet your specific needs.

References/Methods.title: Methods
References/Methods.description: CometChatUIKit is a class that contains all necessary methods to help initialize the CometChat SDK with valid credentials for the ui kit to utilize.
